      • translate

        public <T> T translate(TextPatternTranslator<T> translator,
              QueryExecutionContext context)
        Description copied from class: TextPattern
        Translate this TextPattern into some other representation. For example, TextPatternTranslatorSpanQuery translates it into Lucene SpanQuerys.
        Specified by:
        translate in class TextPatternCombiner
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of object to translate to
        Parameters:
        translator - the translator to use
        context - query execution context to use
        Returns:
        result of the translation
